testcase.classname: System should allow to read all customers' information using the api endpoint
testcase.name: Verify to read all customers' data set
testcase.system-out: Given use the api endpoint "https://www.gmibank.com/api/tp-customers".......passed Then get all customers' information as de-serialization.....................passed Then verify the number 20 that is equals to the customers'number created from user.passed Then write to all customers' "ssn","firstName" and "lastName" in a .txt file.passed Then get all the information of the "5th customer"..........................passed Then verify that 5th customer's first name "Ally" and ssn "33880"...........passed
